uk.org.lidalia.test

Class StaticTimeRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.org.lidalia.test.StaticTimeRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class StaticTimeRule
extends Object
implements org.junit.rules.TestRule
    A JUnit rule that sets the time returned by the Joda Time classes to a static time for the duration of the test.

    At the start of each test the time as viewed by Joda Time classes is frozen to the provided time. At the end of the test it is returned to the system time. This makes time based testing predictable.
